column4: how come import is not in synaptic? i enabled universe and multiverse repositories?
sivik, yes the program named import
sivik, synaptic is a gui front end to apt-get. they both use the same repositories
what?  Well, if you switch arches completely (386 to ppc for instance) you'd need to reinstall
generic uses all the optimizations for specific processors, it just determines them at runtime
that sort of thing will get you banned, by the way.
single user mode for ubuntu is available at the grub prompt (recovery kernel)
okay thanks. ill remember that next time.
man page would require me to have update-manager ;)
